issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Go to the RM Web ui page.  Click on the Applications link, then click on a particular application. The applications details page inadvertently includes the RM about page information after the application details:

Cluster ID: 	1321943597242
ResourceManager state: 	STARTED
ResourceManager started on: 	22-Nov-2011 06:33:17
ResourceManager version: 	0.23.0-SNAPSHOT from 1203458 by user source checksum 0c288fc0971ed28c970272a62f547eae on Tue Nov 22 06:31:09 UTC 2011
Hadoop version: 	0.23.0-SNAPSHOT from 1204629 by user source checksum 421c41e5cfbed4a9d473b123425ad94f on Tue Nov 22 06:29:17 UTC 2011
fields.summary: RM web ui application details page shows RM cluster about information

comments.body: My approach was to add the AppPage and AppBlock classes so that we can migrate the functionality from the RmController over time if need be. This was a minor change and test cases were added since no functionality was added with this change.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12505450/MAPREDUCE-3453.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    -1 findbugs.  The patch appears to introduce 12 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1360//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1360//artifact/trunk/hadoop-mapreduce-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-mapreduce-examples.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1360//console

This message is automatically generated.
No test needed for this simple change.

+1 Verified the UI change on a single node cluster.
Committed to trunk and branch-0.23. Thanks Jonathan.
Thanks for taking a look, Sid.

Integrated in Hadoop-Common-trunk-Commit #1356 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Common-trunk-Commit/1356/])
    MAPREDUCE-3453. RM web ui application details page shows RM cluster about information. (Contributed by Jonathan Eagles)
